content: {"name": "Oakland Hope , Gleaners mobile pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients must be Oakland County residents, have government-issued photo ID, and meet eligibility requirements.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.oaklandhope.org/Food-Pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "20 Walton Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Pontiac", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48340", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.67647100000001, "longitude": -83.2994316}, "phones": [{"number": "(248) 309-3658", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}]}
